stepAnswer: total amount of required gas increases by $$10$$
stepTitle: The function G(m) gives the number of gallons of gas required to drive $$m$$ miles. Interpret $$G\left(m\right)+10$$.
answerLatex: total amount of required gas increases by $$10$$
choices: total amount of required gas increases by $$10$$
the number of miles or the input increases by $$10$$
